name: Misty Island
description:
Prologue:

You wake up in an unknown shore of an unknown island, it's up to you to get out of that place and optionally find out what happened in there.

Short text based adventure.

Controls:

Since there's no main menu yet I'll just post them here.

It's text. You write. That's it.

You can a combination of verbs and nouns to progress through the story and map, here's a list of them and how to use them.

  • Help : Displays all available verbs
  • Exit: Exits the game
  • Go <Direction>: Used to move through the map, directions are forward, back, left and right
  • Use <ItemName>: Use the item in the current location
  • Get <ItemName>: Get the item in the current room
  • Give <ItemName>: Give the item if there's something that can accept it.
  • Examine <ItemName>: Take a closer look to an item
  • Inventory: Displays your current inventory
  • Read <ItemName>: Reads (If there's something to read) an item.
  • Say <Noun>: Say the noun in the current location.
  • TalkTo <ItemName>: Talk to the item if the item can speak back.
